Can somebody please tell me what to do once i have the files downloaded? There is no ISO image, just a bunch of random files. What the hell do i do with those!
You have to unrar them, i would recommend winrar or 7-zip to "un-pack" them.
i'v unpacked them but i only get a bin and a cue file but no iso. any help??

Try mounting the .bin, then try mounting the .cue. Some Virtual Disk programs use the .bin, some need the .cue to tell them how to use the .bin. Didn't your mother ever tell you to try new things?
